thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Applied Industrial Technologies Updates EPS Guidance For FY2018 To $3.19 To $3.39 Per Share

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Applied Industrial Technologies Updates EPS Guidance For FY2018 To $3.19 To $3.39 Per Share
text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Applied Industrial Technologies Inc :
* APPLIED INDUSTRIAL TECHNOLOGIES INC - UPDATED ITS GUIDANCE REGARDING IMPACT OF ACQUISITION OF FCX PERFORMANCE, INC. ON ITS FISCAL YEAR 2018 RESULTS
* APPLIED INDUSTRIAL TECHNOLOGIES INC - UPDATED 2018 GUIDANCE INCLUDES ADVERSE IMPACT OF $0.12 TO $0.13 IN ONE-TIME TRANSACTION-RELATED CASH CHARGES
* APPLIED INDUSTRIAL TECHNOLOGIES INC - UPDATED EPS GUIDANCE FOR FISCAL YEAR 2018 OF $3.19 TO $3.39 PER SHARE
* APPLIED INDUSTRIAL TECHNOLOGIES INC - 2018 SALES ARE ANTICIPATED TO BE 15% TO 16% HIGHER YEAR-OVER-YEAR INCLUSIVE OF ACQUISITION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
